operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO user_pts_updates (user_id, pts, pts_count, update_type, update_data, date2) VALUES (:user_id, :pts, :pts_count, :update_type, :update_data, :date2)

operation.name: SelectLastPts
operation.sql: SELECT pts FROM user_pts_updates WHERE user_id = :user_id ORDER BY pts DESC LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectByGtPts
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, pts, pts_count, update_type, update_data FROM user_pts_updates WHERE user_id = :user_id AND pts > :pts ORDER BY pts
